pkgmetadata.longdescription: Zero-Inflated and Hurdle INAR(1) Models // Provides tools for estimating Zero-Inflated INAR(1) (ZI-INAR(1)) and Hurdle INAR(1) (H-INAR(1)) models using 'Stan'. It allows users to simulate time series data for these models, estimate parameters, and evaluate model fit using various criteria. Functions include model estimation, simulation, and likelihood- based metrics.
